text: Anna Karenina () is a 1967 Russian drama movie directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi and was based on the 1877 novel of same name by Leo Tolstoy. It stars Tatiana Samoilova, Nikolai Gritsenko, Vasily Lanovoy, Yury Yakovlev, Iya Savvina, Maya Plisetskaya and was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi
title: Anna Karenina (1967 movie)
